name: Famicase 00004 - Take off Chicano! Catgirl Paradise
name_original: Famicase 00004 - Take off Chicano! Catgirl Paradise
description:
Inspired by this Famicase entry.

NOW ADDS THE ALL IMPORTANT PRESS 'M' TO MUTE (for when i noodle around with music)

Part of the Famicase Sketchbook. I started this one and got it so cats could follow you after you "attacked" them. But then I made the mistake of drawing some incidental objects and thinking "you know, you should be able to walk behind and in front of those" and got sidetracked making that a reality. I had sort of rework how I did collision at a base level but now characters can walk in front of an behind thing!

Move with a gamepad, play with cats and win their hearts with A(X)

OR

Move with keyboard, play with cats and win their hearts with S
